mapper.update: merge into tmg_yearly y using dual on (dual.dummy is not null and y.tmy_cemployeeid = #{employeeId} and y.tmy_nyyyy = to_number(tmg_f_get_the_year(to_date(#{yearLastDay}, 'yyyy/mm/dd'),#{custId}, #{compCode})) and y.tmy_ccompanyid = #{compCode} and y.tmy_ccustomerid = #{custId}) when matched then update set tmy_comment = #{comment} , tmy_dmodifieddate = sysdate , tmy_cmodifieruserid = #{modifieruserId} , tmy_cmodifierprogramid = 'UAttendanceBook' when not matched then insert (tmy_ccustomerid , tmy_ccompanyid , tmy_cemployeeid , tmy_dstartdate , tmy_denddate , tmy_cmodifieruserid , tmy_dmodifieddate , tmy_cmodifierprogramid , tmy_nyyyy , tmy_comment) values ( #{custId}, #{compCode}, #{employeeId} , to_date('1900/01/01', 'yyyy/mm/dd'),to_date('2222/12/31', 'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{modifieruserId} , sysdate ,'UAttendanceBook' , to_number(tmg_f_get_the_year(to_date( #{yearLastDay}, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), #{custId}, #{compCode})),#{comment})
mapper.select: select nvl(mgd_csparechar1, '''''') mgd_csparechar1, nvl(mgd_csparechar2, ' ') mgd_csparechar2, 'col'||rownum col_name from mast_generic_detail where mgd_cgenericgroupid = #{items} and mgd_nsparenum2 >= #{displayLine} and mgd_csparechar1 is not null order by mgd_nsparenum1, mgd_nsparenum2
